entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VS Code project system doesn't watch for potential .editorconfig files #70590
  • Primary constructors fixer creates invalid code around nested class constructor parameters #70586
  • C# intellisense integration tests are flaky #70582
  • Roslyn unable to evaluate local variables on Windows Forms on file with Unicode characters #70580
  • Create an integration test for validate the Roslyn build scripts on incoming arcade PRs #70579
  • System.NullReferenceException - while using a SpeculativeSemanticModel outside of a regular method body #70575
  • '/warnaserror-:DiagnosticId' should not nullify diagnostic severity settings for 'DiagnosticId' in globalconfig #70570
    17.10
  • Generate Method inside a static lambda should generate a static method #70565
  • Primary constructors: Add node for primary parameter variables #70564

Closed

  • C# out param is not reported as an error in visual studio if a local function is called. #69775
    17.9
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34226.35 #70576
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34226.21 #70574

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable flaky test #70589
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Add restore support to the language server #70588
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not allocate unused fields for primary constructor parameters in a state machine type. #70587
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Remove usage of CWT in syntactic classifier #70584
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make struct type into a record. #70581
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Switch to a different Editor API to fix test flakiness #70578
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure '/warnaserror-:DiagnosticId' does not nullify globalconfig severity setting #70572
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Bump Razor to 7.0.0-preview.23525.7 #70568
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70585
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Ensure errors are reported when compiler is unable to emit a required attribute. #70556
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Disable flaky tests #70583
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Handle authorization exceptions when reading files #70558
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70545
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70577
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Modify BKTree.Lookup to pass the threshold to GetEditDistance when there will not be a need for the actual edit distance #70567
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix regression in definite assignment analysis for out parameters in presence of local functions. #70563
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Workaround issue #70570 #70571
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70569
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70566
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update some logging in the project system #70445
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Resolve reference paths to absolute paths #70527
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Apply the GitHub Copilot workaround to new-framework integration tests #70561
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70562
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70591
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Adjust incorrect MemberNotNullWhen attribute #70557
    Area-Compilers
  • Add external access code action operation for renaming after code actions #70531
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add mapCode handler and ExternalAccess.Copilot #70468
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update the approach we use to layer classifications #70522
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • fix Inline temporary variable adds unnecessary cast #70423
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Flip 'pull diagnostics' to be on by default. #70040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix a couple of bugs found in "use collection expression" #70539
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update arrays in roslyn to use collection expressions #70528
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • PR feedback and further cleanup/sharing in extract method code. #70481
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for \e escape sequences in c# strings and characters #70497
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP - Remove IObjectWritable #70277
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Function pointer calling convention IDE support #59062
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Look scope by scope for method group natural type #69158
    Area-Compilers, 17.9
  • Restrict EnableGenerateDocumentationFile to .NET 8 warning wave #70491
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make parent frame available in nested sync `catch` #70513
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Ensure proper receiver value is used for a constrained call invocation #70401
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Run analyzer consistency checks on .NET Core #70517
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Don't report CLS compliance warnings for attributes on inacessible types #68527
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Backlog
  • Switch MSBuildWorkspace to running builds out of proc #70469
    Area-IDE, untriaged
